product_name: Merrell Mix Master Move Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: For those who crave the feeling of the ground beneath their feet but like the idea of a little extra cushioning for longer miles, choose the minimalist Merrell Mix Master Move Road-Running Shoes.
short_description: For those who crave the feeling of the ground beneath their feet but like the idea of a little extra cushioning for longer miles, choose the minimalist Merrell Mix Master Move Road-Running Shoes.
